Detailed Description

Global level management of OCTOR control system.

static CmdLineArgs* Octor::getCmdLineArgs (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Pointer to command line arguments passed to init().

static void Octor::init (  int  argc,
char *  argv[]
)  [static]
 

One time initialization and configuration. Call this as the first function in a program. The user the provide the following switches:

  • -gui Start qmotor gui for control loop.
  • -qmotorconfig Specify qmotor config file.
  • -globalconfig Specify a global config file.

static void Octor::shutdown (   )  [static]
 

Shutdown procedure. Will loop through all subsystems and call their shutdown function.
